trans-unit.target: TEXT_JOBAST299_02123_JANNEQUINARD_000_000<tab>Greetings and welcome to the Athenaeum Astrologicum. Perhaps you were drawn by fate to this place of learning─or perhaps you wish to know more of fate itself?
TEXT_JOBAST299_02123_Q1_000_000<tab>Do you wish to know more of fate?
TEXT_JOBAST299_02123_JANNEQUINARD_000_001<tab>Then you were wise to come hither. For in the stars are written the fates of every woman and man on Hydaelyn.
TEXT_JOBAST299_02123_JANNEQUINARD_000_002<tab>So you say, yet here you are. You need only learn to open your eyes and see the answers which lie above us in the boundless firmament.

TEXT_JOBAST299_02123_JANNEQUINARD_000_003<tab>It was there in the stars that I read a <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> would call upon the Athenaeum this very day. A <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> who would play an important role in <var 1A 02 /var>my<var 1A 01 /var> own life.

TEXT_JOBAST299_02123_JANNEQUINARD_000_004<tab>Ah, but my apologies. Even the most skilled reader cannot scry a name from the heavens. Would you be so kind as to give me yours, so that I might know who is to be my newest protégé?
TEXT_JOBAST299_02123_Q2_000_000<tab>Give Jannequinard your name and become his protégé?

TEXT_JOBAST299_02123_JANNEQUINARD_000_010<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Well... I was not expecting that. But what is a name, but an attempt by our begetters to wield power over the lives of their sons and daughters? Lives whose paths have already been foretold! In a sense, that is.

TEXT_JOBAST299_02123_JANNEQUINARD_000_0011<tab>My name is Jannequinard de Durendaire and I am an astrologian for the Holy See. Remember that name, for it shall echo forevermore in the annals of Ishgardian history. Well...it will once I put it there. Once <var 1A 02 /var>we<var 1A 01 /var> put it there!

TEXT_JOBAST299_02123_JANNEQUINARD_000_015<tab>Well...er... That was awkward. It would not be entirely true if I said this was the first time my offer had been spurned today... But Twelve be damned, I was certain you were the <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> from my vision!
